page.title: 12LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: LEGEND CONTD. THE DRAGON WAS STANDING BESIDE THE BODIES OF HIS NINE DAUGHTERS.ON RETURNING TO THE VILLAGE THE FARMER RAISED THE ALARM,AND THE LOCAL INHABITANTS ARMING THEMSELVES WITH SPADES etc.GAVE CHASE TO THE MONSTER. AMONG THE CROWD WAS A YOUNG MAN CALLED MARTIN,THE BOY FRIEND OF ONE OF THE DAUGHTERS .MARTIN WAS WELL_KNOWN FOR HIS STRENGTH ,AND GRIEF_STRICKEN HE WENT AFTER THE MONSTER.HE FOUND THE MONSTER,SET ABOUT IT, AND WHEN THE VILLAGERS SAW THIS THEY SIMULTANIOUSLY SHOUTED OUT"STRIKE MARTINE!" THE PLACE WHERE THIS EVENT TOOK PLACE HAS BEEN CALLED STRIKE MARTINE OR STRATHMARTINE TO THIS DAY.
